definition: to be good at using (sth)/to put (sth) to good use
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
see 知人善任[zhi1 ren2 shan4 ren4]

sentences.english: We always have time enough , if we will but use it aright .
sentences.chinese: 只要我們能善用時間，就永遠不愁時間不夠用。

sentences.english: To achieve these, a leader needs communication as a main tool.
sentences.chinese: 一個領袖需要善用溝通作爲工具來達到以上幾點。

sentences.english: We always have time enough, if we will but use it alright.
sentences.chinese: 只要我們能善用時間，就永遠不愁時間不夠用。

sentences.english: And, finally, we should continue our task, working with what we have on hand.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們當善用手上的資源，繼續努力下去。

sentences.english: You use your time and money more wisely.
sentences.chinese: 你會更懂得善用金錢和時間。

sentences.english: Tadao Ando is good at using the plain concrete in his architecture works.
sentences.chinese: 安藤忠雄的建築作品善用清水混凝土。

sentences.english: It reminded investors just how bold and opportunistic Mr Li can be.
sentences.chinese: 這向投資者顯示出李先生的勇敢果斷和善用機會。

sentences.english: A switch-hitter in baseball should be naturally ambidextrous.
sentences.chinese: 左右開弓的棒球運動員自然是兩手都善用的。

sentences.english: Use the magic of compound interest.
Make maximum use of available legislation to confiscate the proceeds of drug trafficking.
sentences.chinese: 善用現行法律以充公販毒得益。

sentences.english: Life is the kaname madoka's currency, spend it well.
sentences.chinese: 生命是小圓的貨幣，善用它。

sentences.english: I want her to respect her body and her right to protect herself.
sentences.chinese: 我希望她善待自己的身體，善用保護自己的權利。

sentences.english: Using your shape is the secret of both fruitfulness and fulfillment in ministry.
sentences.chinese: 善用你的特色是你在事工中能得着滿足與果效的祕訣。

sentences.english: He learned painting from the famous painter Ju Ran and was good at using wet brush and strokes.
sentences.chinese: 他的畫師承巨然，善用溼墨，充分發揮水墨的特性。

sentences.english: III. We must properly use our spiritual gifts to serve effectively.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須善用我們的屬靈恩賜來作有果效的服事。

sentences.english: Professor Yan Dexin is good at the treatment for senile diseases.
sentences.chinese: 顏德馨教授善用膏方治療老年病。

definition: to apply (knowledge etc) creatively and flexibly/to use a word flexibly (e.g. a noun as an adjective)
multipurpose/having several uses
to use/to put to use
to be good at/to be adept at
in common usage
to be good at/to be adept at
appropriate/suitable
not stick to one pattern
to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
appropriate/suitable
to use habitually/habitual/customary
to use sth to the full/to make the best use of everything
to be good at/to be expert in
Gaoming district of Foshan city 佛山市[Fo2 shan1 shi4], Guangdong
brilliant/superior/tall and bright
ingenious/clever/ingenuity/artifice
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
